name: G-Max Volcalith
effect: The Rock-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Rockfall while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves.  Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Additionally, deal 1 Damage against all foes at the end of each Round, rock-types are immune to this damage. Lasts 4 turns.
description: The user summons a mighty pillar of rock that falls onto the foe. As it lands, rock fragments get scattered everywhere, making it hard to move around without getting cut.
